inventory.name: strange symbol
inventory.description: A circle inside another circle. It doesn't seem to do anything.

castle_start.name: Castle Starting Room
castle_start.description: You wake up in a dimly lit room lit by candles on the walls. There's a locked door ahead. You have no memory of how you got here.

castle_hall.name: Castle Hall
castle_hall.description: A grand hall with echoing footsteps. Paths lead to various rooms.

castle_library.name: Castle Library
castle_library.description: Shelves filled with ancient books. Maybe some clues here.

castle_armory.name: Castle Armory
castle_armory.description: Weapons and armor racks. Some might be useful.

castle_kitchen.name: Castle Kitchen
castle_kitchen.description: Pots and pans, some food scraps. Nothing fancy.

dragon_chamber.name: Dragon Chamber
dragon_chamber.description: A massive chamber with ancient carvings. The dragon blocks the path to the outside.

town_square.name: Town Square
town_square.description: A small town terrified by a nearby hydra. Villagers look scared.

forest.name: Forest
forest.description: Dense woods with paths leading deeper.

shrine.name: Shrine
shrine.description: An ancient shrine with mystical aura. A memorization puzzle guards the magic scroll.

shop.name: Town Shop
shop.description: A shop where you can buy items.

dock.name: Dock
dock.description: A wooden dock extending into the sea. From here, you can sail to other islands if you have a boat.

npcs.name: Townsperson A
npcs.dialogue: Welcome to Lokendar, traveler. The city has seen better days.

npcs.name: Townsperson B
npcs.dialogue: Keep your wits about you; rumors of monsters in disguise abound.

npcs.name: Townsperson C
npcs.dialogue: Nothing to see here, just going about my day.

npcs.name: Townsperson D
npcs.dialogue: What brings you to this part of town? Looking for trouble?

central_chamber.name: Central Chamber
central_chamber.description: The central chamber of the capital.

junkyard.name: The Junkyard
junkyard.description: A desolate expanse filled with broken machinery and refuse.

black_keep_gate.name: Black Keep Gate
black_keep_gate.description: The imposing gate of the Black Keep, a dark fortress shrouded in mist. Ancient runes pulse faintly on the stone.

black_keep_courtyard.name: Black Keep Courtyard
black_keep_courtyard.description: A cracked stone courtyard surrounded by crumbling towers. Shadows move in the corners.

black_keep_hall.name: Black Keep Hall
black_keep_hall.description: A long hall lined with faded tapestries. The air feels heavy with dread.

black_keep_armory.name: Black Keep Armory
black_keep_armory.description: Rusted weapons and armor lie scattered, remnants of a forgotten garrison.

razukan_lair.name: Razukan's Lair
razukan_lair.description: A foreboding chamber pulsing with dark energy. Razukan stands here, his presence chilling the air.

spring_of_courage.name: Spring of Courage
spring_of_courage.description: A sacred spring surrounded by ancient statues. Waves of enemies emerge to test your resolve!

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.description: A swirling vortex of water. The Kraken rises from the depths, attacking your boat!

enemies.name: Kraken
enemies.title: Kraken, Terror of the Seas
enemies.description: A massive octopus-like beast with tentacles whipping through the waves, its beak snapping hungrily.

lokendar_dock.name: Lokendar Dock
lokendar_dock.description: A sturdy dock in Lokendar's harbor. From here, you can sail back to other islands if you have a boat.
